name: Adventure Defense
description:
Adventure Defense is an adventure and tower defense game crossover made for Ludum Dare 41. Explore the world to gather resources while also defending your base.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement

Click on nearby items in the world to mine them

Click on text under the crafting section to craft that item

Space Bar - Sprint (uses stamina)

Picks improve mining speed.

Axes improve tree cutting speed.

Crafting Cheat Sheet

Wood Pick/Axe - 5 wood

Stone Pick/Axe - 3 wood 5 stone

Metal Pick/Axe - 3 wood 5 metal

Wood Gun - 3 wood

Stone Gun - 3 wood 3 stone

Metal Gun - 3 stone 3 metal

Fire Gun - 3 wood 3 coal 3 metal

Laser Gun - 3 coal 3 metal 3 crystal

Triple Gun - 3 coal 6 metal 6 crystal
